Brotherly Love
Prepare for War
The Sons of Rhodri go to War
Gwined Declares War
With their father's lands divided between them, the Sons of Rhodri grow hostile towards one-another. War seems inevitable. We may want to take advantage of their disunity.

The Sons of Rhodri have not forgotten how their father was slain in battle against Mierce. Your spies indicate that preparations for war are under way thus we should be ready for whatever they may bring.
The Sons of Rhodri have delcared war on you. Either you or they shall be slain before this is over.
Gwined has emerged as the great unifier of Wales once again. With their Kingdom secure, they have once more turned their attention towards avenging the Death of Rhodri.

Your Brother, King of Seisilwig, has refused to join Powis in their invasion of Miercna. Instead, they have declared war upon the smaller Kingdoms that they neighbour, seeking to build their own power while we weaken ourselves against the Saxons.
Your Brother, King of Seisilwig, has decided to join Powis in their invasion of Miercna.

Your Brother, King of Seisilwig, gave Powis assurances that his army would join in the invasion of Miercna. However, now that the invasion has begun, Seisilwig has declared war upon Powis, seeking to take their lands after Mierce has destroyed their armies.
Seisilwig refuses to help Powis
Seisilwig joins Powis
Seisilwig betrays Powis
Brotherly Love
The Sons of Rhodri go to war
When Rhodri died, his lands were divided amongst his sons. Now, they march to war against their kin in the hope of ruling over a united Wales.
The sons of Rhodri, quarrelsome as they may be, have banded together to invade Mierce and avenge their father. Time will tell how long their alliance lasts.
